welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hamilton, a charming city known for its rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that this beautiful city has to offer. We hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and follow the instructions to access it.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edinburgh Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Gates 1-10
terminals.description: This terminal is used for domestic flights within the United Kingdom.

terminals.name: Gates 11-20
terminals.description: This terminal is used for international flights to destinations outside of the United Kingdom.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Prestwick Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Prestwick Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
